title: Riot
body:
hey Riot can i ask you to add Arabic language to the game please i can help with that too . please give me an answer
thank you

replies.body: At the moment Arabic isn't one of the [**available languages**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594), unfortunately, but I'll do my best to pass this along to see about getting it added in!
